description: Detects reg command lines that disable certain important features of Microsoft Defender Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Registry Defender Tampering
query: (process.executable:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line:(*SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR *SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\*) AND process.command_line:*\ add\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/d\ 0*)
